# @10play/expo-air

> Vibe Coding for React Native â€” AI-powered on-device development with Claude.

expo-air is a development SDK that adds a floating widget overlay to iOS devices running Expo/React Native apps. Developers can send prompts to Claude directly from their phone, and see real-time code changes via Metro hot reload.

## Docs

- [Introduction](/docs): Overview of expo-air and its features
- [Installation](/docs/installation): Prerequisites and setup instructions
- [Quick Start](/docs/quick-start): Get running in under 5 minutes
- [Configuration](/docs/configuration): Configuration options and config plugin
- [CLI Reference](/docs/cli): All available CLI commands (init, start, fly, server)
- [API Reference](/docs/api): JavaScript API, components, and types

## Links

- Source: https://github.com/10play/expo-air
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@10play/expo-air
